member.name: RECONVERTSTRING
member.summary: Defines the strings for IME reconversion. It is the first item in a memory block that contains the strings for reconversion.

member.name: RECONVERTSTRING.dwSize
member.summary: Size of this structure and the memory block it heads.

member.name: RECONVERTSTRING.dwStrLen
member.summary: Length of the string that contains the composition string.

member.name: RECONVERTSTRING.dwStrOffset
member.summary: Offset from the start position of this structure.

member.name: RECONVERTSTRING.dwCompStrLen
member.summary: Length of the string that will be the composition string.

member.name: RECONVERTSTRING.dwCompStrOffset
member.summary: Offset of the string that will be the composition string.

member.name: RECONVERTSTRING.dwTargetStrLen
member.summary: Length of the string that is related to the target clause in the composition string.
